channel.title: Some Help Would Be Appreciated
channel.description:
Hi I Am Looking For Some To Help Me To Do 2 Things
How Do I Add The Dragon Claw Special To My Server?
^(help on d claws is very appreciated i tried the search bar but all it came up with was a gfx list)
How Do You Edit Wildy Levels?
^(i no where to edit them but idk how to code it correctly, the coords stuff)
Plz help me on this will be very appreciated and maybe even give me a link to a tut or sumthing that would be cool to, Thx for reading =]

item.title: Some Help Would Be Appreciated
item.dc:creator: @123is456 123is456
item.description:
@123is456 wrote:

K4rn4ge:

In client.java correct?

Yes sir.

Read full topic

item.title: Some Help Would Be Appreciated
item.dc:creator: @FuryofEdge FuryofEdge
item.description:
@FuryofEdge wrote:

look for the method called isinwild and you’ll see coords… with a bunch of ll absx absy blah blah ll then more coords here ll then more coords here… etc… the little bars separate the coords… make 2 bars… and add the coords of where u want ur wild to be. ur gona have 2 noclip, to find out how far over to the left, and right(x axis) and high and low (y axis) u gotta put… if u go in, and it doesnt work… change the coords. for example… you have absx >=400 absx <=300… and it dont work, change the first one to 300, and the second one to 400. it happened to me… then save and compile. make a copy of the client.java first, and put it on ur desktop so if u mess up u can replace. dont give up easy. and btw, its the first type of wildy, not the second… itll b like…
METHOD HERE-BLAH BLAH
BLAH BLAH
TYPE == 1 BLAH BLAH
BLAH BLAH
TYPE == 2 BLAH BLAH

BLAH BLAH BLAH… its under type 1. GL=]

Read full topic
